org.apache.poi.poifs.eventfilesystem

Class POIFSReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.poi.poifs.eventfilesystem.POIFSReader

  • public class POIFSReader
extends java.lang.Object
    An event-driven reader for POIFS file systems. Users of this class first create an instance of it, then use the registerListener methods to register POIFSReaderListener instances for specific documents. Once all the listeners have been registered, the read() method is called, which results in the listeners being notified as their documents are read.(POIFS文件系统的事件驱动读取器。此类的用户首先创建此类的实例，然后使用registerDocs方法来注册特定文档的POIFSReaderDocs实例。注册所有监听器后，就会调用read（）方法，这会导致监听器在读取其文档时收到通知。)

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on errors reading, or on invalid data(java.io. IOResponse-读取错误或数据无效)

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(POIFSReaderListener listener)
        Register a POIFSReaderListener for all documents(为所有文档注册POIFSReaderFinder)
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to be registered(监听者-要注册的监听者)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if listener is null(java.lang. NullPointerResponse-如果监听器为空)
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if read() has already been called(Java.lang. IllegalStateExcept-如果已调用read（）)

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(POIFSReaderListener listener,
                             java.lang.String name)
        Register a POIFSReaderListener for a document in the root directory(为根目录中的文档注册POIFSReaderFinder)
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to be registered(监听者-要注册的监听者)
        name - the document name(名称-文档名称)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if listener is null or name is null or empty(java.lang. NullPointerResponse-如果监听器为空或名称为空或空)
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if read() has already been called(Java.lang. IllegalStateExcept-如果已调用read（）)

      • registerListener

        public void registerListener(POIFSReaderListener listener,
                             POIFSDocumentPath path,
                             java.lang.String name)
        Register a POIFSReaderListener for a document in the specified directory(为指定目录中的文档注册POIFSReaderFinder)
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener to be registered(监听者-要注册的监听者)
        path - the document path; if null, the root directory is assumed(path -文档路径;如果为空，则假定为根目录)
        name - the document name(名称-文档名称)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if listener is null or name is null or empty(java.lang. NullPointerResponse-如果监听器为空或名称为空或空)
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if read() has already been called(Java.lang. IllegalStateExcept-如果已调用read（）)

      • setNotifyEmptyDirectories

        public void setNotifyEmptyDirectories(boolean notifyEmptyDirectories)
        Activates the notification of empty directories.

        If this flag is activated, the listener receives POIFSReaderEvents with nulled name and stream

        (激活空目录通知。如果激活此标志，监听器将接收具有空名称和流的POIFSReaderEvents)
        Parameters:
        notifyEmptyDirectories - if true, empty directories will be notified(notifyEmptydirectories -如果为真，将通知空目录)

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        read in files(读取文件)
        Parameters:
        args - names of the files(args -文件名称)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the files can't be read or have invalid content(java.io. IOResponse-如果文件无法读取或包含无效内容)
